message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I understand you want a larger share, but I believe a 60-40 split in my favor is more reasonable considering the inflation rates we face.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe I deserve the larger share.
Alice, the clock is ticking and the value is dropping rapidly. I'm offering a 65/35 split.  Let's be realistic and close this deal.
I know time is of the essence, but I still think I can get a better deal. Meet me in the middle.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this 70/30 split before the inflation eats away any chance of a decent agreement for you.
